column1: Urgghh! I always clean under the cushions! It's YOUR turn this week!
column2: 呃啊啊！老是我打掃坐墊下面！這週輪到你了！

column1: You're being childish, Haley. I do the vast majority of work in this house, and you know it.
column2: 你真孩子氣，海莉。這房子裡大部分的家務都是我做的，你心知肚明。

column1: Oh, it's that new farm boy.
column2: 哦，是那個新來的農場男孩。

column1: Oh, it's that new girl from the farm.
column2: 哦，是那個新來的農場女孩。

column1: He has a name, you know.
She has a name, you know.
Hey, I bet you'll understand my point of view here.
*sigh*... I'm really sorry to involve you in this, @. Haley is complaining because I asked her to clean under the cushions.
column2: *唉*……抱歉把你牽扯進來了，@。海莉在抱怨我讓她打掃坐墊下面。

column1: It's only because I cleaned them last week!
column2: 那是因為上週是我打掃的！

column1: Stop whining and just clean it!
Haley, why not have this be your one weekly job?
column2: 海莉，何不每週固定打掃一次呢？

column1: Emily, take the high road and do it this time.
column2: 艾米麗，這次就去打掃吧。

column1: Alright, you win. I guess this can be my job every week. Then there won't be any reason to argue over it.

column1: Thanks, @. That was a great solution.

column1: *sigh*... I guess I'll just do it, then...

Yes
No

column1: Thanks!

It looks great!
What does it do?

Make an excuse and leave.
Try to kiss her.

One moment...
